text: I wanna be the very best, like no one ever was. To catch them is my real test, to train them is my cause. I will travel across the land, searching far and wide,Teach Pokemon to understand, the power that's inside.Pokemon.gotta catch them all.It's you and me.I know it's my destinyPokemon.Oh.you're my best friend,in a world we must defend.Pokemon.Gotta catch them all.A heart so true.Our courage will pull us through!You teach me and I'll teach you! Pokemon! Gotta Catch them All.Gotta Catch them All!POKE-KE-MON!
